exits.description: the plains stretch to the north
home lies just to the east
a small mass of land juts out into the sea to the south
coast lies to the west, you can smell the sea from here

description: this stretch of the grasslands, between your home and the coast, is safe. the grass is not as tall here, and the beasts of the plains do not go near the sea.
investigationDescription: you hear the grass rustling in the light wind, and beyond that, the mighty churning of the ocean.

home lies just to the east
a small mass of land juts out into the sea to the south
coast lies to the west, you can smell the sea from here

description: this stretch of the grasslands, between your home and the coast, is safe. the grass is not as tall here, and the beasts of the plains do not go near the sea.
investigationDescription: you hear the grass rustling in the wind, and beyond that, the mighty churning of the ocean. the wind blows stronger now, and you can smell the sea.

exits.description: the plains stretch to the north
home lies just to the east
a small mass of land juts out into the sea to the south
coast lies to the west, you can smell the sea from here

description: this stretch of the grasslands, between your home and the coast, is safe. the grass is not as tall here, and the beasts of the plains do not go near the sea.
investigationDescription: you hear the grass rustling in the wind, and beyond that, the mighty churning of the ocean. the wind blows stronger now, and you can smell the sea.

exits.description: the plains stretch to the north
home lies just to the east
a small mass of land juts out into the sea to the south
coast lies to the west, you can smell the sea from here

description: this stretch of the grasslands, between your home and the coast, is safe. it is not wise to be out at night regardless.
investigationDescription: in the dark, you can see little. better to go home for now.

exits.description: coast lies to the west, the glow is stronger now, you are almost upon it

description: you continue to the west of your home, through the grasslands. the glow is stronger now.
investigationDescription: you can see the glow off to the west.

exits.description: the plains stretch to the north
home lies just to the east
a small mass of land juts out into the sea to the south
coast lies to the west, you can smell the sea from here

description: you make your way back to the grasslands nearest to home. you notice a fear blooming inside of you. you should not be out alone at night.
investigationDescription: in the dark, you can see little. better to go home for now.

exits.description: the plains stretch to the north
home lies just to the east
a small mass of land juts out into the sea to the south
coast lies to the west, you can smell the sea from here

description: a moment of dizziness strikes you as you walk the same path through the grass as you did last night. it seems ordinary again in the light of day.
investigationDescription: you can just make out the scuttling of small animals of the plains. the smell of the sea is stronger than it was yesterday.

exits.description: the plains stretch to the north
home lies just to the east
a small mass of land juts out into the sea to the south
coast lies to the west, you can smell the sea from here

description: this is the wrong direction, the beast is to the east.
investigationDescription: you do not feel compelled to look around, it is time for the hunt.
